entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
